meanings.definition: Cook (meat or other food) on a barbecue.
meanings.sent1: We enjoy braaing burgers on the grill.
meanings.sent2: Dad will be braaing chicken for dinner tonight.
meanings.sent3: The neighbors are braaing sausages, and the smell is making me hungry.
meanings.sent4: The chef was braaing the steaks to perfection, creating a mouth-watering aroma.
meanings.sent5: The family gathered around the barbecue, braaing their favorite foods together.

meanings.definition: The act of cooking food on a barbecue.
meanings.sent1: The delicious smell of braaing filled the backyard.
meanings.sent2: We had a fun braaing session with friends last weekend.
meanings.sent3: The annual braaing competition brought out the best grill masters in town.
meanings.sent4: The backyard was alive with the sounds of laughter and braaing.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of braaing wafted through the neighborhood, enticing everyone to join in.
